body:
Comment 1: 
This is a 6g compiler bug; it happens earlier at line 6: One should not be allowed to
declare i with a uint constant in the first place. gccgo complains correctly with:

test.go:6:7: error: initialization expression has wrong type
_Labels changed: added **compilerbug**._ _Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
